Title: Creates a single, streamlined process whereby combination pre-kindergarten and daycare programs may be certified to operate
Summary: Creates a single, streamlined process whereby a facility or program operating both a pre-kindergarten program and a daycare program may apply for and receive any certification, licensing, or other requirement otherwise necessary to operate a pre-kindergarten program or daycare program under the laws of the state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to creating a single, streamlined process whereby combination pre-kindergarten and daycare programs may be certified to operate
